p: Based on the Equation ( 7), the optimal experimental conditions were as follows: GA to MD ratio 2.38, total solids content 39.08%, wall to core ratio 5.33, and inlet air temperature 153.78°C. Taking into account the actual situation, the experimental conditions were modified slightly as follows: GA to MD ratio 2.38, total solids content 39%, wall to core ratio 5.33, and inlet air temperature 154°C.
